scripts.start-electron:default: export DISPLAY=:0.0 && export ELECTRON_START_URL=http://localhost:3000 && electron main
scripts.start-electron:windows: set DISPLAY=:0.0 && set ELECTRON_START_URL=http://localhost:3000 && electron main
scripts.debug:default: export ENVIRONMENT=debug && concurrently 'npm run start-react' 'npm run start-flask' 'sleep 5 && npm run start-electron'
scripts.debug:windows: set ENVIRONMENT=debug && concurrently 'npm run start-react' 'npm run start-flask' 'sleep 5 && npm run start-electron'
scripts.dev:default: export ENVIRONMENT=development && concurrently 'npm run start-react' 'sleep 5 && npm run start-electron'
scripts.dev:windows: set ENVIRONMENT=development && concurrently 'npm run start-react' 'sleep 5 && npm run start-electron'
scripts.clean:default: rm -rf python/venv-app python_build python_dist python_spec build dist
scripts.clean:windows: rmdir python\venv-app python_build python_dist python_spec build dist
scripts.package-electron: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run build-python && electron-builder build -c.extraMetadata.main=main/index.js --publish never
